survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Autonomous Vehicle Features Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights into consumer preferences and concerns regarding autonomous vehicle features to guide future product development and marketing strategies.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an autonomous vehicle in the next 5 years?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How likely are you to consider purchasing an autonomous vehicle in the next 5 years?

questions.question_text: Which of the following autonomous vehicle features are most important to you? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice). Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following autonomous vehicle features are most important to you? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is your biggest concern about using autonomous vehicles?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed responses. Ensure the text box is large enough for thorough answers.

script.question_text: What is your biggest concern about using autonomous vehicles?

questions.question_text: How much would you be willing to pay extra for autonomous features in a vehicle?
questions.client_notes: Use predefined price ranges to simplify analysis. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How much would you be willing to pay extra for autonomous features in a vehicle?
